Philips Hue Remote API¶

Contents:

callapi.api(request, path)¶

This class can handle PUT and POST, as a pass-through layer to the official API. The response code will always be 200 regardless of the status. The GET method will be the same as the official api call to endpoint /api. A full list of all the status of Philips Hue system

Parameters:
  • request – request from flask
  • path – path info following /api/****
callapi.constructCustomMsg(apiEndPoint, command, method)¶

method can be PUT/POST/GET all must be string apiEndPoint is command is JSON format same as the official documentation

Parameters:
  • apiEndPoint (str) – The same as oficial API /api/<username>/*** by removing /api/<usename>/ part
  • command (str) – JSON string of the command to be sent
  • command – PUT/GET/POST/DELETE in string format
Return type:

str
Returns:

the actual API call body sent to the official server
callapi.getPhilipsHueInfo()¶

This method get all info related the the hue bridge

callapi.messageToSent(action)¶

this method construct message to sent in order to turn on or off ALL lights+light strip in the system

Parameters:action (str) – on/off
callapi.philipsControl(action)¶
callapi.philipsControlCustom(msgToSent)¶

actual message sender

callapi.philipsInfo()¶
Returns:return true if all lights are on, otherwise false
